Introduction
This topic contains general principles for evaluating muscle injuries, including
types of muscle injuries
standard muscle strength grading system for examinations
identification of muscle groups (MGs) in examination reports
, and
fractures associated with gunshot wound (GSW) and shell fragment wounds (SFW)
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E - Muscle Injuries
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E
